languages.text: "Зарождаются отношения?.. Право, Леди Кассия, рядом с вами я становлюсь безрассудным. Примите ли вы мои чувства как ответный дар?"

traits.locale_text: "Зарождаются отношения?.. Право, Леди Кассия, рядом с вами я становлюсь безрассудным. Примите ли вы мои чувства как ответный дар?"

languages.text: "A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"
languages.original_text: "Зарождаются отношения?.. Право, Леди Кассия, рядом с вами я становлюсь безрассудным. Примите ли вы мои чувства как ответный дар?"

traits.locale_text: "A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"
"A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"
"A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"
"A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"

languages.text: «¿Una relación? A decir verdad, lady Cassia, estar junto a usted me ha vuelto imprudente. ¿Aceptaría mis sentimientos como un obsequio recíproco?».
languages.original_text: "A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Una relación? A decir verdad, lady Cassia, estar junto a usted me ha vuelto imprudente. ¿Aceptaría mis sentimientos como un obsequio recíproco?».

languages.text: 「関係？ カシア、正直言うとお前の近くにいることで私は無鉄砲になってしまうのだ。お返しとして、私の気持ちを受け入れてくれないか？」
languages.original_text: "A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"

traits.locale_text: 「関係？ カシア、正直言うとお前の近くにいることで私は無鉄砲になってしまうのだ。お返しとして、私の気持ちを受け入れてくれないか？」

languages.text: “两人之间的关系？老实说，卡西娅女士，光是在你身边，我就会变得冲动不已。你愿意接受我的感情作为回礼吗？”
languages.original_text: "A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"

traits.locale_text: “两人之间的关系？老实说，卡西娅女士，光是在你身边，我就会变得冲动不已。你愿意接受我的感情作为回礼吗？”

languages.text: « Une relation ? Pour tout vous dire, dame Cassia, votre présence à mes côtés m'a {mf|rendu imprudent|rendue imprudente}. Voulez-vous bien accepter l'offrande de mes sentiments en échange de votre cadeau ? »
languages.original_text: "A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"

traits.locale_text: « Une relation ? Pour tout vous dire, dame Cassia, votre présence à mes côtés m'a {mf|rendu imprudent|rendue imprudente}. Voulez-vous bien accepter l'offrande de mes sentiments en échange de votre cadeau ? »

languages.text: "Eine Beziehung? In Wahrheit, Lady Cassia, hat es mich fahrlässig werden lassen, in Eurer Nähe zu sein. Akzeptiert Ihr als Gegengeschenk meine Gefühle?"
languages.original_text: "A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"

traits.locale_text: "Eine Beziehung? In Wahrheit, Lady Cassia, hat es mich fahrlässig werden lassen, in Eurer Nähe zu sein. Akzeptiert Ihr als Gegengeschenk meine Gefühle?"

languages.text: "İlişki mi? Gerçek şu ki Leydi Cassia, seninle yakınlaşmak beni pervasız biri yaptı. Hediyen karşılığında içimdeki hisleri kabul eder misin?"
languages.original_text: "A relationship? In truth, Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. Will you accept my feelings as a reciprocal gift?"

traits.locale_text: "İlişki mi? Gerçek şu ki Leydi Cassia, seninle yakınlaşmak beni pervasız biri hâline getirdi. Hediyenin karşılığında içimdeki hisleri kabul eder misin?"
